overview: HELIX ASPERSA tells the story of Maria, a 22-year-old girl who lives under the oppression and lack of communication of her mother and the world that sorrounds her.  Suddenly and unexpectedly, and as the only way to escape from her condition, the main character will undergo a deep metamorphosis, where dreams and reality will intermingle until she is completely stripped of her humanity, to find freedom beyond everything that’s rational.
title: Helix Aspersa
